all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Lift up your hearts and be glad, for I am in your midst, and am your advocate with the Father; and it is his good will to give you the kingdom.
Doctrine and Covenants 29:5
Quote of the Day
"We must never allow doubt to hold us prisoner and keep us from the divine love, peace, and gifts that come through faith."
David P. Homer | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
